description: Enable AI agents to query and manage cloud-connected data sources using SQL, metadata introspection, and stored procedures. Integrate with AI workflows to enhance data-driven decision making.

host.description: Host address if using HTTP/SSE transport

port.description: Port number if using HTTP/SSE transport

tools.name: queryData
tools.description: Execute SQL queries against connected data sources and retrieve results

query.description: The SQL statement(s) to execute. Separate multiple statements with semi-colons

parameters.description: A JSON object containing a list of query parameters. All parameter names must begin with @

schemaOnly.description: If true, the result only includes column metadata

defaultSchema.description: Schema to use if tables are not prefixed with a schema name

tools.name: execData
tools.description: Execute stored procedures against connected data sources

procedure.description: The name of the stored procedure to execute

parameters.description: A JSON object containing procedure parameters. All parameter names must begin with @

defaultSchema.description: Schema to use if the procedure is not prefixed with a schema name

tools.name: getCatalogs
tools.description: Retrieve a list of available connections from CData Connect Cloud.  The connection names should be used as catalog names in other tools and in any queries to CData Connect Cloud. Use the `getSchemas` tool to get a list of available schemas for a specific catalog.

tools.name: getColumns
tools.description: Retrieve a list of available database columns from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

tableName.description: Optional table name to filter columns by

columnName.description: Optional column name to filter by

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter columns by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter columns by

tools.name: getExportedKeys
tools.description: Retrieve a list of foreign key relationships from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

tableName.description: Optional table name to filter by

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter keys by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter keys by

tools.name: getImportedKeys
tools.description: Retrieve a list of foreign key relationships from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

tableName.description: Optional table name to filter by

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter keys by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter keys by

tools.name: getIndexes
tools.description: Retrieve a list of indexes from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

tableName.description: Optional table name to filter by

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter indexes by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter indexes by

tools.name: getPrimaryKeys
tools.description: Retrieve a list of primary keys from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and table

tableName.description: Optional table name to filter by

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter keys by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter keys by

tools.name: getProcedureParameters
tools.description: Retrieve a list of stored procedure parameters from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog, schema, and procedure

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter parameters by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter parameters by

parameterName.description: Optional parameter name to filter by

procedureName.description: Optional procedure name to filter parameters by

tools.name: getProcedures
tools.description: Retrieve a list of stored procedures from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog and schema

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter procedures by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter procedures by

procedureName.description: Optional procedure name to filter by

tools.name: getSchemas
tools.description: Retrieve a list of available database schemas from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog.  Use the `getTables` tool to get a list of available tables for a specific catalog and schema.

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter schemas by

tools.name: getTables
tools.description: Retrieve a list of available database tables from CData Connect Cloud for a specific catalog and schema.  Use the `getColumns` tool to get a list of available columns for a specific table.

tableName.description: Optional table name to filter by

schemaName.description: Optional schema name to filter tables by

catalogName.description: Optional catalog name to filter tables by
